translations: 行医，当医生（doctor 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: He was accused of doctoring the figures.
This phenomenon has set off an intensifying discussion at hospitals and medical schools about a problem perhaps best described as "distracted doctoring".
sentences.translation: 这种现象在医院和医学院引发了关于“分心诊断”这一问题的激烈讨论。

sentences.sentence: She has been doctoring since before you were born.
sentences.translation: 从你们出生前至今，她一直在行医。
